name: The Crystals Of Dawn
description:
When the soldiers of the undead Baroness burn down your village, you are captured and sold as a slave. But this is only the begin of your adventures. Your fellow slave recognises your magical talent, and your girlfriend turns out to be a spy in service of an imfamous rebel group.

Only you can free the lands of the tyranny of evil because ...- well, the others are very busy currently.

"The Crystals Of Dawn" is a classic RPG/Adventure with first person 3D graphics and a round based fighting system in an open world environment. Explore several towns, villages, castles and dungeons in ~15h gameplay. The game control is simple and uses the mouse and some keys on the keyboard.

This is the first beta version of the game, thus I provide it for free. But don't worry, the storyline is completed and 100% playable, so you can play the main quest till the end.
There are some improvements planned for the future:

General improvements of graphic deisgn and performance, an improvement of the fighting system including more options for the ally characters, and more side quests. Also, a second part is planned.
